name: numerals-converter
description: Roman Numerals Converter - Full Stack Application

scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist node_modules
scripts.benchmark: docker compose --profile benchmark up --build --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from benchmark && docker compose down
scripts.perf:smoke: docker compose --profile dev up --build -d --wait && docker compose run --rm k6 run /scripts/smoke.test.js && docker compose down
scripts.perf:load: docker compose --profile dev up --build -d --wait && docker compose run --rm k6 run /scripts/load.test.js && docker compose down
scripts.perf:stress: docker compose --profile dev up --build -d --wait && docker compose run --rm k6 run /scripts/stress.test.js && docker compose down
scripts.perf:all: npm run perf:smoke && npm run perf:load && npm run perf:stress
